scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && npm run activate-venv && pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && pip install -r requirements/dev.txt && deactivate
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm run activate-venv && python3 run.py
scripts._start:frontend: dotenv -e .env -- wait-on http-get://$(echo $NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_API_HOST | sed 's/^http:\/\///')/health && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run prisma && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.prisma:prepare:frontend: rm -f frontend/prisma/schema.prisma && cat frontend/prisma/generator.prisma shared/prisma/schema.base.prisma > frontend/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:prepare:backend: rm -f backend/prisma/schema.prisma && cat backend/prisma/generator.prisma shared/prisma/schema.base.prisma > backend/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:generate:backend: cd backend && npm run activate-venv && prisma generate
scripts.prisma:sync: source backend/venv/bin/activate && cd shared/prisma && prisma migrate dev --schema schema.base.prisma && deactivate
scripts.prisma: npm run prisma:prepare && npm run prisma:generate
scripts.pre-commit:backend: npm run activate-venv && cd backend && pre-commit run && deactivate
scripts.pre-commit: concurrently "npm run pre-commit:backend npm run pre-commit:frontend"
